attributes.action: TELL US WHY YOU ARE WASTING TAXPAYER POUNDS ON CEOP.
attributes.additional_details: The world knows that the British establishment condones child abuse and has a policy of complete protection of child abusers and cover up to protect offenders.  In that scenario any taxpayer pounds expended on running CEOP is an absolute waste of money - and you know it - come clean. TELL US THE TRUTH BEHIND THE CON BEING PERPETRATED BY POLITICIANS, PRETENDING TO TRY TO FIND CHILD ABUSERS.
